name: Makalink
description: Makalink is a Web3 social product with features including social media, community-based groups, and instant messaging. Makalink's core narrative is that creators are owners, social data is portable, data and DID are open, data and credentials accumulated on the chain are shared across the ecosystem with strong composability. Makalink is a SocialFi application that derives value and utility through an application built on top of a decentralized social primitive, with tokens on top of that as decentralized incentives.
